review:
I recommend doctor, but the fact that, you won't feel to visit again due to the rude behaviour of supporting staffs in billing and appointment section. Staff are not responsible. 
Asked for the test results through mail and given the mail id also. Even after 2 days, I didn't receive any. 
Don't loose money unnecessarily.

My wife had visited the hospital and it was gynecology related. ****** *** **** ** **********. I can definitely recommend the doctor to my family or friends. I am satisfied with the treatment given by the doctor. Scanning was done. There was no waiting time in the hospital.

I have consulted the doctor for a gynecology issue. ************ *** ** ** *** ****** *** ** *** * ***** ********* ** ***** * *** ******* ****** ***** * ***** I am 50 percent happy with consultation. ******* **** ********** ** *** ****** *** ** *** *** ********** There was more waiting time in the hospital, I waited for 2 hours. Doctor was decent but didn't interact much.

We visited to her for breast pain sharp stabbing inflammation in breast and also high prolactin level. She is very rude doctor in prescription she mentioned only Restyl tablet. *** ***** **** ********* ********* *** **** **********
